initial_box.p: I am a web developer focused on frontend, I also have knowledge in backend. I love technology and study continuously, always looking to learn what's new. I have a degree in Arts and Design from UFJF and I have a degree in Cinema and Audiovisual from the same institution.

hidrofobia_modal.title: Hidrofobia
hidrofobia_modal.about: Hidrofobia is a website developed with the purpose of promoting the film that I produced and directed. Not just publicizing, but being a means of raising funds for the film's production through a personalized and exclusive form integrated with Google Forms. In this project there is also a gallery of behind-the-scenes photos from the recording days.

somuuh_modal.title: Somuuh
somuuh_modal.about: Somuuh is a social network project focused on working with authentication and design. Exploring references such as Instagram, Twitter and Spotify.

notein_modal.title: NoteIn
notein_modal.about: NoteIn is a project in which I focused on working with authentication with a non-real database (mongoDB)

pokedex_modal.title: Pokedex
pokedex_modal.about: Pokedex is a project that aims to bring together all the pokemons in one place, with their information, such as abilities (in bars) and images

todo_modal.title: ToDo
todo_modal.about: ToDo is a web application that seeks to store items defined by the user in the browser, mark them as completed or even remove them. React, Next.js, LocalStorage, Typescript and SASS were used.

compare_modal.title: Compare
compare_modal.about: Compare is an application that compares a list of followers of a user on github with the list of people that this user follows, generating two other lists: that of users that the current user follows but does not follow him back, and that of users that the current user does not follow but follow him. Generating a link for each user profile in these two lists, allowing you to follow or unfollow users
